scene.name: intro
scene.line: You still here, Karla? I thought your shift was over hours ago ...
Karla joined us as a contractor, upgrading the aging racks in the warehouse.
Of course we can't just `empty` the warehouse to replace the wood all at once, so she's reconstructing the latticework lockstep with our aging schedule.
She does a little extra carpentry for us here and there, just to cover the fees.
Keeping ahead of your self-employment taxes at least, Karla? Sometimes it's all we can do.
